title: |Rainwater Harvesting unit in Irrigation land|Success stories|Farmers|Official Rainy|Agriculture|

subtasks: Approach the combine harvester
Step onto the combine harvester
Engage the seat and adjust position
Start the combine harvester engine
Monitor the operation of the combine harvester
Direct the combine harvester through the field
Watch for potential hazards and adjust if necessary
Place bales into the combine harvester for processing
Clear blockages from the combine harvester
Gather crops from the combine harvester after processing
Load gathered crops onto a wagon or truck
Manage tasks related to crop transport and storage
Check combine harvester for any mechanical issues
Perform minor repairs or adjustments on the combine harvester
Lubricate moving parts of the machinery
Clean the combine harvester after use
Refuel the combine harvester as needed
Monitor weather forecasts before harvest
Prepare equipment in case of bad weather
Adjust harvesting schedule based on precipitation and temperature
